February 17, 2016 by Justin Guay Leave a Comment Co-Authored by Anthony Eggert Climate Works Oil Campaign Director Just last week President Obama made headlines by floating a $10 per barrel oil tax . This needs to be the opening salvo in a renewed effort to move the country beyond oil, but the effort also needs to be more ambitious.
